Title: Peter Pan
Writer: Jerome Robbins (adaptation), J.M. Barrie (based on the play by)
Actors: Mary Martin, Cyril Ritchard, Lynn Fontanne, Maureen Bailey
Plot: In this magical tale about the boy who refuses to grow up, Peter Pan and his mischievous fairy sidekick Tinkerbell visit the nursery of Wendy, Michael, and John Darling. With a sprinkling of pixie dust, Peter and his new friends fly out the nursery window and over London to Never-Never Land. The children experience many wonderful and exciting adventures with the Lost Boys, Tiger Lily's Indian tribe, and Peter's arch enemy, the dastardly pirate Captain Hook.
